Achievements.Details: Awarded INR 50 Lakhs for development of Clinical Translational Research CAD project (BIRAC/IKP01207/BIG-16/20) by BIRAC (Bio-technology Industry Research Assistance Council), Dept. of Biotechnology, and Govt. of India.
Awarded 4.5 stars by Institution Innovation Council (IIC) for undertaking various activities prescribed by Innovation Cell, MoE, Govt. of India to promote Innovation and Start-Up culture in campus.
Won 1st Prize in Smart India Hackathon
Won the award for Best Academic Support at the Best 25 Higher Education Preparation Centre Awards for South Asia organised by Cambridge English Language Assessment
Won the award for Innovation & Growth at the Cambridge English Annual Co-ordinators Meet.

Finalists at  2015 Cambridge English Language Assessment awards for preparation centres for the category Digital Innovation & Technology. We were the only college in the entire of Asia to have made it.
Bagged 2nd  position  all over  India in Microsoft Imagine cup.
Ranked first in IBM The Great Mind Challenge, a National Competition.
